node.address: kilometro 22 Arroyo de Piedra , Cartagena, Colombia

content.value:
More than 400 m of private virgin beach, free from the hustle and bustle of the city and the dazzling Caribbean landscapes are at your fingertips when staying at Arena Beach Hotel. You can enjoy night events on the beach, a campfire and a romantic dinner at sunset, spa services for two, tours to the pink sea and the mud volcano. You will experience total rest and privacy during your stay.

Arena Beach Hotel offers private rooms with private bathrooms, air conditioning and TV. Our cabins are made in an ecological way in containers with all the comforts of a hotel and with the innovation of protecting the environment.

description.description: Arena Beach is a beach hotel located on the road to the sea just 20 minutes from the historic center of Cartagena. With 40 rooms and direct access to the sea, we have beach kiosks and food and beverage services to enjoy the fabulous coastal cuisine and delicious cocktails on the beach. We also have event rooms and 5 pools with chairs for sunbathing.
